title: Denis Kurepanov
text:
Denis Kurepanov (born March 30, 1988) is a <a href="Russians">Russian</a> professional <a href="ice%20hockey">ice hockey</a> <a href="forward%20%28ice%20hockey%29">forward</a> currently playing for <a href="Yuzhny%20Ural%20Orsk">Yuzhny Ural Orsk</a> of the <a href="Supreme%20Hockey%20League">Supreme Hockey League</a> (VHL).
Kurepanov made his <a href="Kontinental%20Hockey%20League">Kontinental Hockey League</a> debut playing with <a href="Metallurg%20Novokuznetsk">Metallurg Novokuznetsk</a> during the <a href="2011%E2%80%9312%20KHL%20season">2011–12 KHL season</a>. Kurepanov played 149 games in the KHL over four seasons with Novokuznetsk before he was released from his contract on June 23, 2015.
